amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to strike funding for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization Security Investment Program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike funding for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization Security Investment Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 46 - 354 (Roll no. 239).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 46 - 354 (Roll no. 239).
